item.title: Anheuser-Busch is foreign beer
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: It's official, InBev has completed its acquisition of Anheuser-Busch. America now makes only the best beers in the world. Of the top 50 breweries in America, here are my favorites and their ranking in size: 1 Boston Beer Co. Boston MA 2 Sierra Nevada Brewing Co. Chico CA 7 Deschutes Brewery, Inc. Bend OR 9 Full Sail Brewing Co. Hood River OR 13 Anchor Brewing Co. San Francisco CA 20 Stone Brewing Co. Escondido CA 21 Rogue Ales / Oregon Brewing Newport OR 25 Dogfish Head Craft Brewery Milton DE 28 The Lagunitas Brewing Co. Petaluma CA 44 Anderson Valley Brewing Co. Boonville CA 46 North Coast Brewing Co. Inc. Fort Bragg CA
